details:
In Horde Groupware, there has been an XSS vulnerability in two components
via the Color field in a Create Task List action.


For Debian 9 stretch, this problem has been fixed in version
2.27.6+debian1-2+deb9u1.


We recommend that you upgrade your php-horde-core packages.


For the detailed security status of php-horde-core please refer to
its security tracker page at:
<https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/php-horde-core>


Further information about Debian LTS security advisories, how to apply
these updates to your system and frequently asked questions can be
found at: <https://wiki.debian.org/LTS>
